overview: As Senior Vice President of Consulting, Janet Clarke leads and manages the WMG Consulting Services group to ensure that WMG clients receive expert guidance on obtaining and managing their GSA Schedule contract. Janet has over 25 years experience in the federal government arena. For the last 15 years she has been dealing exclusively with GSA Schedule contracts and VA Schedule contracts. She has a vast amount of expertise in a variety of GSA Schedule issues as they apply to clients, both small and large. Prior to joining WMG, Janet worked at FedSources, A Washington Management Group Company, as a GSA Schedule Consultant for five years. Janet has also held positions as contract administrator and manager, program manager for federal contracts and business development manager with large federal contractors including Wang Laboratories, Sun Microsystems and 3 Com Corporation.
